verses.name: Mark 11:4
verses.text: And they went their way, and found the colt tied by the door without in a place where two ways met; and they loose him.

verses.name: Mark 11:5
verses.text: And certain of them that stood there said unto them, What do ye, loosing the colt?

verses.name: Mark 11:6
verses.text: And they said unto them even as Jesus had commanded: and they let them go.

verses.name: Mark 11:7
verses.text: And they brought the colt to Jesus, and cast their garments on him; and he sat upon him.

verses.name: Mark 11:8
verses.text: And many spread their garments in the way: and others cut down branches off the trees, and strawed them in the way.
